intervention_catalogue.name: Creating positive connections
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Designed to support desistance by enabling conversations in supervision that will help the person on probation.
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
Designed to support desistance by enabling conversations in supervision that will help the person on probation: 

Understand social capital and its benefits.

Identify their networks.

Develop their confidence and feel a sense of connection.
